titleStmt.title: Prudence the first of the foure cardinall virtues. Written by Sr. Miles Sandis, Kt
Prima pars parvi opusculi
titleStmt.author: Sandys, Miles, Sir, 1600 or 1601-1636.
Marshall, William, fl. 1617-1650, engraver.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for W: Sheares, in Brittaines Burse,

notesStmt.note: A reissue of "Prima pars parvi opusculi", with letterpress title page cancelled by an engraved title page signed "W.M. scu:", i.e. William Marshall. Variant: letterpress title page uncancelled.
Copies reported lack the cancellations and additions found in some copies of STC 21731.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
